name: Adarsh!
greetingText: Wishing you all the best always!
wishText: May God bless every step of your journey and fill your life with endless happiness. I also wish you and your family good health and joy always. Happy Birthday, Adarsh!

text2: At first, I was just going to send you a simple message...

text5Content: You are truly an amazing person, Adarsh
